name: Marble Maze (Anik Barua)
description:
Name: Anik Barua

CS - UY 3113

Summary - I created a 3D game where the player can control a ball through a maze of obstacles. The game contains 3 levels in total and the difficulty increases as you go to the next level. For level 2 and level 3, player have the jump feature controlled by the space bar and there is a height/bounce limitation for the ball. I experimented with different mass, materials, friction, gravity and applied them to each component of the game.
